author: andreas
content:
@darkness: Thanks, great site that you link to, all the images say such and such number of comments, but how on earth does one comment there? When I click on the word "comments", the page simply gets reloaded. Am I stupid?

@Bill: Glad you like the flowers. There are so many of them now, that it's hard to avoid shooting them, but I think if I can I'll try to get some other subjects as well ðŸ™‚

You may see some more shallow DOF though.
